stem: Given question: What might a teacher do most during a week? and answer: work in school, explain why in
no_more_50_words: Teachers are usually employed at schools, and most people work during weekdays.
100_to_150_words: A teacher typically works in school during the week. During this time, they have many responsibilities. They must prepare lessons, teach classes, grade assignments, and provide feedback to students. They may also have to meet with parents, attend staff meetings, and complete administrative tasks. Additionally, they may need to plan and implement extracurricular activities. This could include supervising clubs, coaching sports teams, or organizing field trips. All of these activities require a significant amount of time and effort, and it is the teacher's job to ensure that they are completed properly. By spending time in school during the week, a teacher can ensure that their students are receiving the best education possible.
